And <S%G2532><s%> when the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%> was <S%G1096>come,<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4864>synagogue:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G191>hearing<s%> him were <S%G1605>astonished,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> From <S%G4159>whence<s%> hath <S%G5129>this<s%> man these <S%G5023>things?<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> is this which is <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5108>such<s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> are <S%G1096>wrought<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hands?<s%>

Is <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5045>carpenter,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G3137>Mary,<s%> <S%G1161>the<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2500>Joses,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2455>Juda,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon?<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G79>sisters<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> <S%G4314>with<s%> <S%G2248>us?<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> they were <S%G4624>offended<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> A <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> without <S%G820>honor,<s%> <S%G1508>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> <S%G3968>country,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> his own <S%G4773>kin,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> his <S%G848>own<s%> house. <S%G3614><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> mighty <S%G1411>work,<s%> save <S%G1508>that<s%> he laid his hands <S%G2007>upon<s%> <S%G5495><s%> a <S%G3641>few<s%> sick <S%G732>folk,<s%> and <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2296>marveled<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G570>unbelief.<s%> <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4013>went<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2968>villages,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> unto him <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to send them <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G846><s%> by two and <S%G1417>two;<s%> <S%G1417><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> over <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3853>commanded<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G142>take<s%> <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> their <S%G3598>journey,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> a <S%G4464>staff<s%> <S%G3440>only;<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4082>scrip,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G740>bread,<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5475>money<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> their <S%G2223>purse;<s%>
But <S%G235><s%> be <S%G5265>shod<s%> with <S%G4547>sandals;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> put <S%G1746>on<s%> <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G5509>coats.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> whosoever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G5209>you,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> when ye <S%G1607>depart<s%> <S%G1564>thence,<s%> shake <S%G1621>off<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5522>dust<s%> <S%G5270>under<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4228>feet<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> against <S%G846>them.<s%> <S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you,<s%> It shall <S%G2071>be<s%> more <S%G414>tolerable<s%> for <S%G4670>Sodom<s%> <S%G2228>and<s%> <S%G1116>Gomorrah<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> for <S%G1565>that<s%> city. <S%G4172><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G1831>out,<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> men should <S%G3340>repent.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1140>devils,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G218>anointed<s%> with <S%G1637>oil<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> that were <S%G732>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of him; <S%G1063>(for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> was spread abroad: <S%G1096>)<s%> <S%G5318><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G907>Baptist<s%> was <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> mighty <S%G1411>works<s%> do show <S%G1754>forth<s%> themselves <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

Others <S%G243><s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2243>Elijah.<s%> <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G243>others<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G3754>That<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> a <S%G4396>prophet,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets.<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> thereof, he <S%G2036>said,<s%> <S%G3778>It<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G607>beheaded:<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G1453>risen<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> had sent <S%G649>forth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> laid hold <S%G2902>upon<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5438>prison<s%> for Herodias' <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G2266><s%> <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G5376>Philip's<s%> <S%G1135>wife:<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> he had <S%G1060>married<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> had <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G2264>Herod,<s%> It is not <S%G1832>lawful<s%> <S%G3756><s%> for <S%G4671>thee<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brother's<s%> <S%G1135>wife.<s%>

Therefore <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2266>Herodias<s%> had a quarrel <S%G1758>against<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> have <S%G615>killed<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>but<s%> she <S%G1410>could<s%> not: <S%G3756><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> <S%G5399>feared<s%> <S%G2491>John,<s%> <S%G1492>knowing<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> was a <S%G1342>just<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4933>observed<s%> <S%G846>him;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> when he <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%> many <S%G4183>things,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2234>gladly.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when a <S%G2121>convenient<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> was <S%G2064>come,<s%> <S%G3753>that<s%> <S%G2264>Herod<s%> on <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G1077>birthday<s%> <S%G4160>made<s%> a <S%G1173>supper<s%> to <S%G848>his<s%> <S%G3175>lords,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> high <S%G5506>captains,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4413>chief<s%> estates of <S%G1056>Galilee;<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G3660>swore<s%> unto <S%G846>her,<s%> <S%G3739>Whatsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> thou shalt <S%G154>ask<s%> of <S%G3165>me,<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> it <S%G4671>thee,<s%> <S%G2193>unto<s%> the <S%G2255>half<s%> of <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G932>kingdom.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> she came <S%G1525>in<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G4710>haste<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king,<s%> and <S%G154>asked,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> thou <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> by and <S%G1824>by<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>charger<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> of <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G910>Baptist.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> exceeding <S%G4036>sorry;<s%> yet for his oath's <S%G1223>sake,<s%> <S%G3727><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> for their sakes which sat <S%G4873>with<s%> him, he <S%G2309>would<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G114>reject<s%> <S%G846>her.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G935>king<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> an <S%G4688>executioner,<s%> and <S%G2004>commanded<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> to be <S%G5342>brought:<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G607>beheaded<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5438>prison,<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5342>brought<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> a <S%G4094>charger,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> to <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2877>damsel:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2877>damsel<s%> <S%G1325>gave<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> to <S%G848>her<s%> <S%G3384>mother.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> took <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4430>corpse,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G3419>tomb.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> gathered themselves <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G518>told<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> all <S%G3956>things,<s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> they had <S%G4160>done,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> they had <S%G1321>taught.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Come <S%G1205><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G373>rest<s%> a while: <S%G3641><s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> there <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5217>going,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they had no leisure so much <S%G2119>as<s%> <S%G3761><s%> to <S%G5315>eat.<s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G565>departed<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> by <S%G4143>ship<s%> <S%G2596>privately.<s%> <S%G2398><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G5217>departing,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G1921>knew<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4936>ran<s%> <S%G3979>afoot<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4172>cities,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4281>outwent<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> came <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> when he came <S%G1831>out,<s%> <S%G1492>saw<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G3793>people,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> was moved with <S%G4697>compassion<s%> <S%G1909>toward<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G4166>shepherd:<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G1321>teach<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> many <S%G4183>things.<s%>
